Notes: (1) Words in the Parent Column update automatically! Please try not to edit these cells directly.
(2) If you accidentally edit the Parent Column cells, you can fix it by inputing "=INDIRECT(ADDRESS(rowFunction(), columnFunction()))" into the cell
(3) If you edit a child cell, make sure to edit the subsequent child cells further down in the tree to match - I cannot create a script to automatically change these cells. Just be aware of this!

(4) Last two columns are just for parsing the tree; please try not to edit them! (If you are curious, the columns are just the unique address that the parent cell inherits from. It will be used to parse redundancies.)

column12: -> means don't need to go further
